about_the_game:
Could you survive a real zombie apocalypse? Day Zero is the best way to test it! With danger waiting around every corner and every decision you make could mean the difference between life and death, what would you do?

In this survival experience, your choices will shape the world. Will you form a group and seek a safe haven, or will you fight alone and stay one step ahead of everyone else? What about your partner? Will you be able to protect him/her and survive together? As you are tested by loyalty, betrayal, hunger and fear, every decision you make will determine not only your fate, but also that of the one you love.

Tough times call for tough decisions. Day Zero aims to give players a realistic zombie apocalypse experience. To survive in this chaotic world, you will need not only courage but also ethical and moral boundaries.

Sometimes you will make sacrifices to save your own life, and sometimes you will face difficult choices to protect your loved ones. Who you will trust, what you will sacrifice and what boundaries you will cross is entirely up to you.

Are you ready for what kind of person you will become in dark times?

Day Zero offers streamers the opportunity to live a unique experience with their community. Thanks to an advanced broadcast integration system, your community will influence every single choice. Now, it's not just you, but your audience that will determine the course of the story.

By presenting your choices to your community live, you can watch how the story will take shape in line with their preferences. If you are looking for a truly interactive experience, Day Zero is the right choice for you!

Every new beginning offers a different story. With hundreds of different scenarios, Day Zero promises a unique experience every time you play. By choosing a new path each time, you'll meet different characters, face different challenges and discover where the story will go.

Play the game over and over again, facing a new situation each time and taking your choices one step further each time. Because every choice, every beginning, every story is different, you never know what events you will encounter.
